text: Assicurazioni Generali S.p.A. or simply Generali Group is an Italian insurance company based in Trieste."Company References ." Assicurazioni Generali. Retrieved on 8 July 2010. As of 2019, it is the largest of its kind in Italy and among top 10 in the world.These are the top 25 largest insurance companies in the world | Insurance Business Asia Under the name of Imperial Regia Privilegiata Compagnia di Assicurazioni Generali Austro-Italiche, the company was founded on December 26, 1831. At the time, Trieste was the most important sea port of the Austrian Empire. The company grew in importance, becoming one of the largest insurance operators both in Italy and in Central Europe. , the company ranks 57th on the Fortune Global 500 list of companies and 43rd on MITs worldwide "Smartest Companies" ranking in 2015. Generaliâ€™s major competitors at international level are AXA, Allianz and Zurich. Besides them, there are companies competing at local and regional level in various countries and markets. == References == Category:1830s establishments in Italy Category:1831 establishments in Europe Category:Companies listed on the Borsa Italiana Category:Companies of Italy Category:Conglomerate companies Category:Insurance companies Category:Trieste
title: Assicurazioni Generali
